            <input accesskey="s" class="loginbutton" tabindex="104" title="Geben Sie zur Anmeldung Ihren Benutzernamen und Ihr Kennwort in die dafür vorgesehenen Textfelder ein oder klicken Sie auf die 'Registrieren'-Schaltfläche, um ein neues Benutzerkonto anzulegen." type="submit" value="Anmelden"/>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 			YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 			vB_XHTML_Ready.subscribe(function()
 			{
 			//
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "focus", navbar_username_focus);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "blur", navbar_username_blur);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password_hint', "focus", navbar_password_hint);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password', "blur", navbar_password);
 			});
 			
 			function navbar_username_focus(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == 'Benutzername')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='';
 					textbox.style.color='#303030';
 				}
 			}
 
 			function navbar_username_blur(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='Benutzername';
 					textbox.style.color='#828282';
 				}
 			}
 			
 			function navbar_password_hint(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "none");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "inline");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.get('navbar_password').focus();
 			}
 
 			function navbar_password(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 				}
 			}
        </script>
       </li>
      </ul>

       <li class="forumbit_nopost L1" id="cat150">
        <div class="forumhead foruminfo L1 collapse">
         <h2>
          <span class="forumtitle">
           <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/joomla-2-5.html">
            Joomla 2.5
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="forumlastpost">

          </span>
          <a class="collapse" href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/forum.php#top" id="collapse_c_cat150">
           <img alt="" src="images/buttons/collapse_40b.png" title="Diese Kategorie einklappen"/>

         </h2>
        </div>
        <ol class="childforum" id="c_cat150">
         <li class="forumbit_post L2" id="forum151">
          <div class="forumrow table">
           <div class="foruminfo td">
            <img alt="" class="forumicon" id="forum_statusicon_151" src="images/statusicon/forum_old-48.png"/>

       <li class="forumbit_nopost L1" id="cat18">
        <div class="forumhead foruminfo L1 collapse">
         <h2>
          <span class="forumtitle">
           <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/sonstiges.html">
            Sonstiges
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="forumlastpost">

            <h5 class="widget_post_header">
             <a class="title" href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/joomla-2-5-installation/330991-testumgebung-installation-h-ngt-beim.html">

             </a>
            </h5>

        <form action="http://www.joomlaportal.de/login.php?do=login" id="navbar_loginform" method="post" onsubmit="md5hash(vb_login_password, vb_login_md5password, vb_login_md5password_utf, 0)">
         <fieldset class="logindetails" id="logindetails">
          <div>
           <div>
            <input accesskey="u" class="textbox default-value" id="navbar_username" name="vb_login_username" size="10" tabindex="101" type="text" value="Benutzername"/>
            <input class="textbox" id="navbar_password" name="vb_login_password" size="10" tabindex="102" type="password"/>
            <input class="textbox default-value" id="navbar_password_hint" name="vb_login_password_hint" size="10" style="display:none;" tabindex="102" type="text" value="Kennwort"/>
            <input accesskey="s" class="loginbutton" tabindex="104" title="Geben Sie zur Anmeldung Ihren Benutzernamen und Ihr Kennwort in die dafür vorgesehenen Textfelder ein oder klicken Sie auf die 'Registrieren'-Schaltfläche, um ein neues Benutzerkonto anzulegen." type="submit" value="Anmelden"/>
           </div>

         </fieldset>
         <div class="remember" id="remember">
          <label for="cb_cookieuser_navbar">
           <input accesskey="c" class="cb_cookieuser_navbar" id="cb_cookieuser_navbar" name="cookieuser" tabindex="103" type="checkbox" value="1"/>
           <acronym style="border-bottom: 1px dotted #000000; cursor: help;" title="Sie bleiben angemeldet, bis Sie sich selbst abmelden.">
            Angemeldet bleiben?

         <input name="s" type="hidden" value="69469e939b9f08e9d9277d90b41c2fdf"/>
         <input name="securitytoken" type="hidden" value="guest"/>

         <input name="vb_login_md5password" type="hidden"/>
         <input name="vb_login_md5password_utf" type="hidden"/>
        </form>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 			YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 			vB_XHTML_Ready.subscribe(function()
 			{
 			//
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "focus", navbar_username_focus);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "blur", navbar_username_blur);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password_hint', "focus", navbar_password_hint);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password', "blur", navbar_password);
 			});
 			
 			function navbar_username_focus(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == 'Benutzername')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='';
 					textbox.style.color='#303030';
 				}
 			}
 
 			function navbar_username_blur(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='Benutzername';
 					textbox.style.color='#828282';
 				}
 			}
 			
 			function navbar_password_hint(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "none");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "inline");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.get('navbar_password').focus();
 			}
 
 			function navbar_password(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 				}
 			}
        </script>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>

            <input accesskey="s" class="loginbutton" tabindex="104" title="Geben Sie zur Anmeldung Ihren Benutzernamen und Ihr Kennwort in die dafür vorgesehenen Textfelder ein oder klicken Sie auf die 'Registrieren'-Schaltfläche, um ein neues Benutzerkonto anzulegen." type="submit" value="Anmelden"/>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 			YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 			vB_XHTML_Ready.subscribe(function()
 			{
 			//
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "focus", navbar_username_focus);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "blur", navbar_username_blur);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password_hint', "focus", navbar_password_hint);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password', "blur", navbar_password);
 			});
 			
 			function navbar_username_focus(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == 'Benutzername')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='';
 					textbox.style.color='#303030';
 				}
 			}
 
 			function navbar_username_blur(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='Benutzername';
 					textbox.style.color='#828282';
 				}
 			}
 			
 			function navbar_password_hint(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "none");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "inline");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.get('navbar_password').focus();
 			}
 
 			function navbar_password(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 				}
 			}
        </script>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
     <div class="ad_global_header">
     </div>
     <hr/>
    </div>

        <ol class="childforum" id="c_cat44">
         <li class="forumbit_post L2" id="forum55">
          <div class="forumrow table">
           <div class="foruminfo td">
            <img alt="" class="forumicon" id="forum_statusicon_55" src="images/statusicon/forum_old-48.png"/>
            <div class="forumdata">
             <div class="datacontainer">
              <div class="titleline">
               <h2 class="forumtitle">
                <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/ver-ffentlichungen-von-komponenten-modulen-templates.html">
                 Veröffentlichungen von Komponenten, Modulen, Templates...
                </a>
               </h2>
               <span class="viewing">
                (1 Betrachter)
               </span>
              </div>
              <p class="forumdescription">
               In diesem Forum könnt Ihr die von Euch entwickelten Komponenten, Module, Mambots und Templates vorstellen bzw. zum Download anbieten.
              </p>
              <div class="subforums">
               <h4 class="subforumlistlabel">
                Unterforen:
               </h4>
               <ol class="subforumlist commalist">
                <li class="subforum">
                 <img alt="" border="0" class="inlineimg" id="forum_statusicon_56" src="images/statusicon/subforum_old-48.png"/>
                 <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/bugfixes.html">
                  Bugfixes
                 </a>
                </li>
               </ol>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>

         <li class="forumbit_post L2" id="forum25">
          <div class="forumrow table">
           <div class="foruminfo td">
            <img alt="" class="forumicon" id="forum_statusicon_25" src="images/statusicon/forum_old-48.png"/>
            <div class="forumdata">
             <div class="datacontainer">
              <div class="titleline">
               <h2 class="forumtitle">
                <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/hinweise-fragen-und-kritik.html">
                 Hinweise, Fragen und Kritik
                </a>
               </h2>
              </div>
              <p class="forumdescription">
               Fragen, Hinweise, Vorschläge und Wünsche zu dieser Homepage gehören in dieses Forum
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
         YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 			YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 			vB_XHTML_Ready.subscribe(function()
 			{
 			//
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "focus", navbar_username_focus);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "blur", navbar_username_blur);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password_hint', "focus", navbar_password_hint);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password', "blur", navbar_password);
 			});
 			
 			function navbar_username_focus(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == 'Benutzername')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='';
 					textbox.style.color='#303030';
 				}
 			}
 
 			function navbar_username_blur(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='Benutzername';
 					textbox.style.color='#828282';
 				}
 			}
 			
 			function navbar_password_hint(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "none");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "inline");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.get('navbar_password').focus();
 			}
 
 			function navbar_password(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 				}
 			}
        </script>
       </li>
      </ul>

        <div class="forumhead foruminfo L1 collapse">

           <div class="smallavatartext widget_post_comment">
            <h5 class="widget_post_header">
             <a class="title" href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/joomla-3-x-sicherheit/331004-hacker-mail-anfragen-von-webseite.html">
              Hacker-Mail-Anfragen von Webseite
             </a>
            </h5>
            <div class="meta">
             Letzter Beitrag von
             <a href="http://www.joomlaportal.de/members/227954.html" rel="nofollow">

        <script type="text/javascript">
         YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 			YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 			vB_XHTML_Ready.subscribe(function()
 			{
 			//
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "focus", navbar_username_focus);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_username', "blur", navbar_username_blur);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password_hint', "focus", navbar_password_hint);
 				YAHOO.util.Event.on('navbar_password', "blur", navbar_password);
 			});
 			
 			function navbar_username_focus(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == 'Benutzername')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='';
 					textbox.style.color='#303030';
 				}
 			}
 
 			function navbar_username_blur(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 				//
 					textbox.value='Benutzername';
 					textbox.style.color='#828282';
 				}
 			}
 			
 			function navbar_password_hint(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "none");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "inline");
 				YAHOO.util.Dom.get('navbar_password').focus();
 			}
 
 			function navbar_password(e)
 			{
 			//
 				var textbox = YAHOO.util.Event.getTarget(e);
 				
 				if (textbox.value == '')
 				{
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password_hint', "display", "inline");
 					YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle('navbar_password', "display", "none");
 				}
 			}
        </script>
       </li>
      </ul>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    //<![CDATA[
 
 var vbseo_jshtml = new Array();
 vbseo_jshtml[0] = "<ol>			<li class=\"restore\" id=\"navbar_notice_1\">		Wenn dies Ihr erster Besuch hier ist,		lesen Sie bitte zuerst die <a href=\"http://www.joomlaportal.de/faq.php\" target=\"_blank\"><b>Hilfe - Häufig gestellte Fragen</b></a>		durch. Sie müssen sich vermutlich <a href=\"http://www.joomlaportal.de/register.php\" target=\"_blank\"><b>registrieren</b></a>,		bevor Sie Beiträge verfassen können. Klicken Sie oben auf \'Registrieren\', um den Registrierungsprozess zu		starten. Sie können auch jetzt schon Beiträge lesen. Suchen Sie sich einfach das Forum aus, das Sie am meisten		interessiert.</li> 		</ol>";
 
 for(var vi=0;vi<vbseo_jshtml.length;vi++)
 if(fetch_object("vbseo_vhtml_"+vi))fetch_object("vbseo_vhtml_"+vi).innerHTML = vbseo_jshtml[vi];
 
 window.orig_onload = window.onload;
 window.onload = function() {
 if (is_ie || is_moz) { var cpost=document.location.hash;if(cpost){ if(cobj = fetch_object(cpost.substring(1,cpost.length)))cobj.scrollIntoView(true); }}
 
 if(typeof window.orig_onload == "function") window.orig_onload();
 }
 
 //]]>
   </script>
